mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'
SELECT MEMBER_NO, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_PROFILE FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING( MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT BOARD_COMMENT_NO AS COMMENT_NO, BOARD_COMMENT_CONTENT AS COMMENT_CONTENT , BOARD_COMMENT_ENROLL_DATE AS COMMENT_ENROLL_DATE, (SELECT b.BOARD_CONTENT FROM BOARD b WHERE bc.BOARD_NO = b.BOARD_NO) AS PARENT_TITLE, 'BOARD' AS COMMENT_TYPE FROM BOARD_COMMENT bc UNION SELECT MEDIA_COMMENT_NO AS COMMENT_NO, MEDIA_COMMENT_CONTENT AS COMMENT_CONTENT , MEDIA_COMMENT_ENROLL_DATE AS COMMENT_ENROLL_DATE, (SELECT m.MEDIA_TITLE FROM MEDIA m WHERE mc.MEDIA_NO = m.MEDIA_NO) AS PARENT_TITLE, 'MEDIA' AS COMMENT_TYPE FROM MEDIA_COMMENT mc )
